title: Distribution and Logistics
bodyText: Exhaust from our delivery vehicles and distribution logistics is a significant source of greenhouse gases; and more than 200,000 of our signature red delivery trucks represent our system around the world. We want them to represent sustainable-oriented transport as well. Our system fleet, which includes our Company and bottling partners, emitted 4.03 million metric tons of greenhouse gases in 2011, which is a 10 percent decrease from our 4.48 tons of fleet emissions in 2010.
